title: "AI system that lets robots manipulate 2,000 objects created: MIT"
excerpt: "MIT scientists have created an artificial intelligence-based algorithm that allows robots to learn how to manipulate and reorient more than 2,000 geometrically different objects, with both the hand facing upwards and downwards."
